channel.title: Comments on: Thanks To Gas Turbine World – And Harry Jaeger for pointing out my error

item.title: By: DougNic
item.dc:creator: DougNic
item.description:
Will Reynolds wanted to make this comment and could not log on, so I am posting it for him:
Hi Doug, >> I was glad to see your new blog post about coal to liquids. >> It doesn't >> make any sense unless your goal is to create more demand >> for coal. >> But your first post also ignored the impacts of longwall >> and mountain >> top removal mining methods. That's still an issue even >> if all the >> other conditions were met. >>
item.content:encoded:
Will Reynolds wanted to make this comment and could not log on, so I am posting it for him:

Hi Doug,
>> I was glad to see your new blog post about coal to liquids.
>> It doesn’t
>> make any sense unless your goal is to create more demand
>> for coal.
>> But your first post also ignored the impacts of longwall
>> and mountain
>> top removal mining methods. That’s still an issue even
>> if all the
>> other conditions were met.
>>
